content:
TIL: https://github.com/dougalsutherland/arxiv-collector
This script allowed me to upload a paper to the arxiv in 5 minutes! And I'm using biblatex etc...
It just generates a .tar.gz with all the style files that you need etc... you upload the tar to the arxiv, and presto!
Do you have to prove the theorems?
No... there is built-in AI that does that for you :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
